Name: zul-iqembulezifundi
Author: Iqembu Lezifundiswa, Mussa Muhammad Telela , Uthman Mfanafuthi Msomi, Moulana Abdur Rahman Chilipa, Haji Ibrahim Mondli Japhet Mthembu, Moulana Imran Ngcobo, Moulana Eshaaq Osman
Source: Islamic Dawah Movement of Southern Africa(IDM), https://www.alqurantranslation.com/

Translations.Text: Futhi noma ngabe sasibe nomusa kubona futhi sayisusa inhlupheko abanayo ngempela babezoqhubeka nokona bephuphutheka
Futhi ngempela sababamba ngesijeziso kepha abazange bazehlise eNkosini yabo futhi abazange bazithobe
Kwaze kwaba yilapho sesibavulela isango lesijeziso esinzima kulapho bona bephelelwe yithemba lapho
Futhi nguyena owanenzela amadlebe namehlo kanye nezinhliziyo, kuncane enikubongayo
Futhi nguyena owanidalayo emhlabeni futhi niyoqoqelwa kuye
Futhi nguyena ophilisayo nodala ukufa futhi kungokwakhe ukushintshana kobusuku nemini ngakube aninamqondo yini na
Kepha bakusho okufana nalokho okwashiwo abasendulo
Bathi, “uma sifile siwuthuli namathambo ngakube ngempela siyovuswa yini na?”
Ngempela sethenjiswa lokhu thina kanye nabobaba bethu ngaphambilini lokhu akuyilutho ngaphandle kokuthi kuyizinganekwane zasendulo
Ithi, “ungokabani umhlaba kanye nalabo abakuwo uma kungukuthi nina niyazi na?”
Bayothi “ungokaMvelinqangi” ithi, “ngakube anikhumbuli yini na?”
Ithi, “ngubani iNkosi yamazulu ayisikhombisa neNkosi yesihlalo sobukhosi esikhulu na?”
Bayothi, “kungokukaMvelinqangi” ithi “ngakube animesabi yini uMvelinqangi na?”
Ithi, “lowo esandleni sakhe okunombuso wezinto zonke futhi yena uyavikela akekho ongazivikela kuyena, uma kungukuthi nina niyazi”
Bayothi, “kungokukaMvelinqangi” ithi, “ngakho-ke ngakube nididekile yini na?”
Kepha sibalethele iqiniso futhi ngempela bona bangabaqambi bamanga

UMvelinqangi akazange abe nendodana futhi akekho omunye uMvelinqangi okanye naye (ukube babebaningi oMvelinqangi) lowo nalowo Mvelinqangi ngempela wayezothatha akudalile futhi abanye babo babezozama ukunqoba abanye, odunyiswayo nguMvelinqangi ngaphezu kwako konke lokho abakuchazayo
Uyisazi sokungabonwayo nokubonwayo uphakeme ngaphezu kwako konke lokho abamenzela ngako abahlanganyeli ekumkhonzeni (izithixo)
Ithi, “Nkosi yami uma ungangikhombisa lokho abathenjiswe kona”
Nkosi yami ungangibeki ebantwini abangalungile
Futhi ngempela thina sinawo amandla okukukhombisa lokho esathembisa kona
Vimba okubi ngalokho okuhle kakhulu, thina siyakwazi ukubedlula bonke lokho abakuchazayo
Futhi ithi, “Nkosi yami ngifuna isiphephelo kuwena ekubalekeleni ububi bukasathane”
Futhi ngifuna isiphephelo kuwena Nkosi yami hleze beze kumina
Kuze kube yilapho oyedwa wabo efikelwa ukufa athi “Nkosi yami ngiphindisele emumva”
Ukuze ngikwazi ukwenza okuhle kulokho engakushiya ngemumva, lutho! Igama nje kuphela alishoyo futhi ngemumva kwabo kunothango kuze kube usuku abayovuswa ngalo
Kuyothi uma sekushawa icilongo akuyikuba khona ubuhlobo phakathi kwabo ngalolosuku futhi angeke babuzwe omunye ngomunye
Ngakho-ke noma ngabe ngubani eziyosinda izikalo zakhe (zezenzo ezinhle) ngakho-ke labo bayilabo abaphumeleleyo
Futhi noma ngabe ngubani eziyobalula izikalo zakhe (zezenzo ezinhle) ngakho-ke labo bayilabo abalahlekelwa imiphefumulo yabo bayohlala esihogweni ingunaphakade
Umlilo uyoshisa ubuso babo futhi bona lapho phakathi bayokoniwa ubuhle
Anizange yini nifundelwe amavesi ami kulapho nina naniwaphika na
Bayothi, “Nkosi yethu kwasinqoba okubi (ukuhlupheka) kwethu futhi sasingabantu abadukile”
Nkosi yethu sikhiphe kukona ngakho-ke uma siphindela kuyobe ngempela singabangalungile
Uyothi (uMvelinqangi) salelani kusona futhi ningakhulumi nami
Ngempela kwakuneqembu ezincekwini zami elathi, “Nkosi yethu sakholwa ngakho-ke sithethelele futhi yiba nomusa kuthina futhi wena ungongcono kunabo bonke abanomusa”
Kepha nina nabenza inhlekisa kwaze kwaba yilapho benenza ukuthi nikhohlwe isikhumbuzo sami futhi nina nanibahleka
Ngempela mina ngibanike umvuzo kulolusuku ngokubekezela kwabo ngempela bona bangabaphumeleleyo
Uyothi, “Nahlala iminyaka emingaki emhlabeni na?”
Bayothi, “sahlala usuku noma ingxenye yosuku ngakho-ke buza labo ababalayo”
Uyothi, “anihlalanga ngaphandle kwesikhathi esincane ukube nje nina benazi”
Ngakube nicabanga ukuthi sanidalela ubala nokuthi nina angeke nibuyiselwe kuthina na
Ngakho-ke makaphakanyiswe uMvelinqangi iNkosi yeqiniso akekho omelwe ukukhonzwa ngaphandle kwakhe, iNkosi yesihlalo sobukhosi esihloniphekile
Futhi noma ngabe ngubani omemeza omunye uNkulunkulu esikhundleni sikaMvelinqangi akanabufakazi ngalokho, ngakho-ke kuphela ukwehlulelwa kwakhe kuseNkosini yakhe ngempela izoni angeke ziphumelele
Futhi ithi “Nkosi yami thethelela, yiba nomusa futhi wena ungongcono kunabo bonke abanomusa”
